Title: Scavenger Hunt in Golden Gate Park

Gate.Body: You are at the gate of Golden Gate Park in San Francisco, CA, located on 19th and Lincoln. This is where you start your scavenger hunt at.
Gate.PicCollect: You are tasked to complete a scavenger hunt throughout Golden Gate Park, taking photos at specific locations in order to attend a cookout at the Dutch Windmill. Here's the list:

Stow Lake.Body: You are at Stow Lake, the largest lake in the park. You can spot pedal boats in the water and people going for jogs.
Stow Lake.PicCollect: You know a real pretty spot to snap your picture, so you hastily make your way over to Strawberry Hill, the island in the middle of the lake. There, you position yourself in front of Huntington Falls, and you're able to save the moment in your phone.

Mothers Meadow.Body: Mothers Meadow, a nice open lawn for families to sit at.
Mothers Meadow.PicCollect: Wanting to start your scavenger hunt off with a bang, you take a selfie of yourself with the the near-empty patch of grass.

Turtle Pond.Body: Turtle Pond is a nice and serene spot, though you are unable to see any turtles.
Turtle Pond.PicCollect: You catch a glimpse of a turtle and try to wait for it to walk in frame. It takes its time, but makes it. You take a picture of yourself with your turtle friend on the floor.

Prayerbook Cross.Body: Prayerbook Cross is a nice peaceful sight, with the imposing cross nearby.
Prayerbook Cross.PicCollect: You snap a selfie infront of the cross, though the lighting isn't the best.

Botanical Garden.Body: The Botanical Garden is a popular spot in the park, getting to see flowers from different countries.
Botanical Garden.PicCollect: You spot the nearby metal arch, intertwined with roses, and snap a picture of yourself inbetween it.

Choices.Prompt: You smell the flowers, a nice little break away from scavenger hunt.

Hellman Hollow.Body: Hellman Hollow is open and spacious, a nice spot for a picnic.

Polo Field.Body: Though it is rare to see a game occur at the Polo Field, it's a nice roundabout to go for a bike ride.
Polo Field.PicCollect: The polo field is pretty large to really find a good picture to take at. You settle for a tunnel picture taken from a nearby bystander.

Rose Garden.Body: Rose Garden is a small nook of the park that shows its true colors.
Rose Garden.PicCollect: You spot the nearby metal arch, intertwined with roses, and snap a picture of yourself inbetween it.

Choices.Prompt: You smell the flowers, a nice little break away from scavenger hunt.

RideoutFountain.Body: Rideout Fountain is the centerplace of many must-sees in Golden Gate Park, including the Japanese Tea Garden, the De Young Museum, and the Academy of Sciences.
RideoutFountain.PicCollect: You're tasked with needing to visit one of the exhibits. Which one do you choose?

AltChoices.PicCollectExt: You decide to purchase an entry ticket into the Japanese Tea Garden. You snap a photo of yourself enjoying some tea and cookies at the tea house.
You decide to purchase an entry ticket into the De Young Museum. You hastily make it to the top of the building and snap a picture of you overseeing the rest of the area.
You decide to purchase an entry ticket into the Academy of Sciences. There are so many cool exhibits, but you decide to settle at the top of the indoor forest.

Koret Children's Playground.Body: A walk away from many of the other attractions, Koret Children's Playground brings back many memories in my childhood.
Koret Children's Playground.PicCollect: The task is to 'have fun at the park'. You decide to snap a picture of yourself going down on the metal slide, and you feel singed because of the hot day.

Lindley Meadow.Body: Lindley Meadow is quiet for the day, with the echoes of the Outside Lands concerts in the air.

Bison Paddock.Body: In the Bison Paddock, you watch the beautiful creatures rome peacefully in their plains.
Bison Paddock.PicCollect: The bizon are grazing in the open field. There's a gentle one laying by the fence, so you snap a picture with you in frame, as it snoozes closeby.

DutchWindmill.Body: The Dutch Windmill stands tall, taking the breeze of the nearby beach.
DutchWindmill.PicCollect: To conclude your journey, you take a picture sitting in the windmill's window sill. You have finally completed the scavenger hunt!

Choices.Prompt: You smell the flowers, a nice little break away from scavenger hunt.

Conservatory of Flowers.Body: The Conservatory of Flowers' open display is a sight to see.
Conservatory of Flowers.PicCollect: You spot the nearby metal arch, intertwined with roses, and snap a picture of yourself inbetween it.

Choices.Prompt: You smell the flowers, a nice little break away from scavenger hunt.
